About

I inquire, deconstruct, understand, and build. A self-employeed web development contractor, who is driven building a music-sharing platform on the side. Prior to this I completed General Assembly's Web Development Immersive, worked R American Express on the all-star Digital Parterships team after graduating from McGill University. I grew up in NYC and was born in Greece.
